attributes.action: Anti Excessive Airbrushing and Sexualization in Public Places
attributes.additional_details:
The government should disallow, via law, corporate images with excessive airbrushing of body or face as well as banning images of a sexual, sexualized or promiscuous nature in the public arena.

In order to promote the safegaurding of children by not exposing them to sexualized or fake perceptions of body image it is the government's full repsonsibility to promote descretion in media and corporate advertising whilst ensuring the freedoms that also exist.
